title: Slab Serif for Watercolor Logo?
content:
Hi-

I'm designing a logo for a school project that is for a bird sanctuary. I am doing a watercolor wing,  
and would like to figure out the proper type to go with it. I like the contrast between having  
a watercolor with a slab serif, but want to see what others think.

The name is called:

Arbutus Migratory Bird Sanctuary.
author: philcozby

comments.content: I'm personally partial to Adrian Frutiger's [Egyptienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721201507/http:/www.linotype.com/358/EgyptienneF-family.html). It's quirky, but that's why I like it more than traditional slabs.
